name: Sixchannels
overview:
Founded in the year 1999 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, SixChannels is a Full Service marketing company that empowers corporations with leading edge Marketing solutions. SixChannels helps companies right from conceptual planning through developing and deploying their marketing strategy. We take a consultative approach when recommending a product or solution to our client that takes you through your entire marketing value chain optimizing your marketing initiatives. It is important to recognize the tremendous multiplier effect from the employment of multiple, coordinated channels.

SixChannels provides online marketing solutions that can improve returns on customer relationships significantly. Its advanced reporting and analytical tools provide an unmatched view into targets of opportunity and help businesses meet and exceed acquisition, sales and retention objectives. By creating a deeper understanding of the customer, SixChannels delivers valuable insights that improve customer interactions far beyond the email channel.

We eke out custom lists based on the criteria placed by you. No matter how niche the target is, we can build custom lists within a very short time from our rich contact master repository. Our custom built package allows access to a database with precise and error free emails.
